name: Dawj Ball
description:
You ever wanted to play dodgeball, but didn't wanna get wacked in the face? Well you're in luck!

Introducing: Dawj Ball

This innovative product is guaranteed at LEAST 5 minutes of fun! It comes with multiple music tracks per level, a (not-so) intelligent AI, and plenty of physics-based shenanigans! 

Don't believe me? Try it yourself, it's FREE! 

Multiplayer is in the works, will update the game when I finish it
